title: EatMyFizz10 Feeding Promos
body:
Can we pls do something about people trolling promos. i just had 
EatMyFizz10 playing a zed mid with revive teleport feed 20 kills in a promo and ruin the whole game. seriously this is the reason why people say these oce server are so toxic people like these need to be delt with by riot.
